radiographic_examinations.findings: Dilated appendix measuring approximately 9 mm in diameter with a tiny luminal appendicolith and periappendiceal fat stranding. Adjacent inflammation and bowel wall thickening of the base of the cecum. Two short segment intussusceptions involving jejunal loops without obstruction. 12 mm hypodensity in the lower pole of the right kidney likely representing a renal cyst. No evidence of extraluminal air or drainable fluid collection. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits; no pleural or pericardial effusion.
